sentence.text: His height was 69 cm (− 4.4 SD) and his weight was 7 kg.
Ultrasound scan was done at 6 months' gestation and showed short limbs.
At birth, he was 43 cm long and 2200 g weight.
Growth was consistently slow since birth.
He had triangular face, presence of lower eyelid fat pads, low nasal bridge and pointed chin.
Skeletal survey revealed a pectus excavatum, rib hypoplasia, spondyloepiphyseal dysplasia, claw hand, pes planus.
He also had abnormal gingival hyperplasia enlarged, abdomen and unilateral cryptorchidism.
He had one episode of pneumonia at newborn period.
His development and bone age were normal at 20 months of age.
